channel.title: Algebra 2 Graphing Functions
channel.description:
Third week of school. A+ so far in every class Except Algebra 2. I had all As in geometry last year. Problem: My teacher.
Can someone please help me "Graph functiona"? Here is the example in the book
Function: y= 0.2x²
Then they have a table [center]X Y -5 5 -4 3.2 -3 1.8 -2 0.8 -1 0.2 0 0 1 .02 2 .08 3 1.8 4 3.2 5 5 [/center] And thers a graph with a parabola on it.
Heres a few of the problems that i have to solve: 1) y=0.3X²
3) y=0.5²
5) y=x+3

item.title: Algebra 2 Graphing Functions
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Teh Freak:

get a graphic calculator, plug it in for the y= section, then press 2nd and graph, and you get the table with all the answers for the various plugins for x, its all #s possible, so pick some that you want to right down, also, for intersections and stuff use the 2nd trace stuff, algebra 2 was easy, though i got a B in the class, failed almost every test the teacher gave out, and then when we take the final state exam, i was one of the only people to get an A, so, dont stress it too much, some teachers just fucking suck at teaching, or teach funny, mine did, and i did better than the kids getting As in my class. now im taking AP Statistics, its fucking stupid.

I’m taking AP Statistics too.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 08:26:00 PM[/size][hr]I hate school…and especially math.

Read full topic

item.title: Algebra 2 Graphing Functions
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

thanks for help.
sry to say ur too late but gr8 explanation.
I woke up at six and went to school early and got 1 on 1 help.
It was easier=). But he still sucks.
Hella ppl got Fs in the class right now =)
I got all As in my geometry calss last year =). So its not like i suck at math =).
But yeah yah tahnks =)))))

item.title: Algebra 2 Graphing Functions
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

Third week of school.
A+ so far in every class
Except Algebra 2.
I had all As in geometry last year.
Problem: My teacher.

Can someone please help me “Graph functiona”?
Here is the example in the book

Function: y= 0.2x²

Then they have a table
[center]X Y
-5 5
-4 3.2
-3 1.8
-2 0.8
-1 0.2
0 0
1 .02
2 .08
3 1.8
4 3.2
5 5
[/center]
And thers a graph with a parabola on it.

Heres a few of the problems that i have to solve:

  1. y=0.3X²

  2. y=0.5²

  3. y=x+3

Read full topic
